question:
Consider the following newspapers/journals with famous personalities associated to them:
  1. Commonweal - Annie Besant
  2. New India - Mahatma Gandhi
  3. Janata - Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar
 Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: New India was a daily newspaper published by Annie Besant. The first issue of commonweal was brought out on January 2, 1914. Annie Besant was the editor of commonweal. In 1930, Dr. Ambedkar started a new journal named, “Janata (The People)”. This magazine lived for 26 years. After that the magazine’s name was changed to “Prabuddha Bharat (Enlightened India)”.
